statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'script' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'site_sections'

update `site_sections` set `value` = '{\"items\":{\"66d1c86ade15b\":{\"language\":{\"en\":{\"heading\":\"Bullion: Simplify Your Mobile Services, Instantly!\",\"sub_heading\":\"Bullion revolutionizes how you manage your mobile services. Tailor your plans effortlessly by customizing airtime top-ups, data bundles, and more to suit your unique needs and preferences. Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all solutions and embrace seamless personalization with PayLoad.\",\"button_name\":\"Join Now\"},\"fr\":{\"heading\":\"PayLoad : Simplifiez vos Services Mobiles Instantan\u00e9ment !\",\"sub_heading\":\"PayLoad r\u00e9volutionne la gestion de vos services mobiles. Adaptez vos forfaits en toute simplicit\u00e9 en personnalisant vos recharges de cr\u00e9dit, vos forfaits de donn\u00e9es et bien plus, selon vos besoins et pr\u00e9f\u00e9rences uniques. Dites adieu aux solutions standard et profitez d\u2019une personnalisation sans effort avec PayLoad.\",\"button_name\":\"Rejoignez-nous maintenant\"},\"es\":{\"heading\":\"PayLoad: \u00a1Simplifica tus Servicios M\u00f3viles al Instante!\",\"sub_heading\":\"PayLoad revoluciona la manera en que gestionas tus servicios m\u00f3viles. Personaliza tus planes f\u00e1cilmente ajustando recargas de tiempo aire, paquetes de datos y m\u00e1s, seg\u00fan tus necesidades y preferencias \u00fanicas. Di adi\u00f3s a las soluciones gen\u00e9ricas y disfruta de la personalizaci\u00f3n sin esfuerzo con PayLoad.\",\"button_name\":\"\u00danete ahora\"},\"ar\":{\"heading\":\"PayLoad: \u0628\u0633\u0651\u0637 \u062e\u062f\u0645\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629 \u0641\u0648\u0631\u064b\u0627!\",\"sub_heading\":\"\u062a\u064f\u062d\u062f\u062b PayLoad \u062b\u0648\u0631\u0629 \u0641\u064a \u0643\u064a\u0641\u064a\u0629 \u0625\u062f\u0627\u0631\u0629 \u062e\u062f\u0645\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629. \u0642\u0645 \u0628\u062a\u062e\u0635\u064a\u0635 \u062e\u0637\u0637\u0643 \u0628\u0633\u0647\u0648\u0644\u0629 \u0645\u0646 \u062e\u0644\u0627\u0644 \u062a\u0639\u062f\u064a\u0644 \u0634\u062d\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u0635\u064a\u062f\u060c \u0628\u0627\u0642\u0627\u062a \u0627\u0644\u0628\u064a\u0627\u0646\u0627\u062a\u060c \u0648\u0627\u0644\u0645\u0632\u064a\u062f \u0644\u062a\u0644\u0627\u0626\u0645 \u0627\u062d\u062a\u064a\u0627\u062c\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0648\u062a\u0641\u0636\u064a\u0644\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0641\u0631\u064a\u062f\u0629. \u0648\u062f\u0651\u0639 \u0627\u0644\u062d\u0644\u0648\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0642\u0644\u064a\u062f\u064a\u0629 \u0648\u0627\u0633\u062a\u0645\u062a\u0639 \u0628\u0627\u0644\u062a\u062e\u0635\u064a\u0635 \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0644\u0633 \u0645\u0639 PayLoad.\",\"button_name\":\"\u0627\u0646\u0636\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u0646\"}},\"id\":\"66d1c86ade15b\",\"image\":\"d53f0eee-9bcc-4511-9d74-f3a722f57457.webp\",\"button_link\":\"register\"},\"66d92f0781bb1\":{\"language\":{\"en\":{\"heading\":\"The One-Stop Solution for All Your Mobile Needs!\",\"sub_heading\":\"Discover the future of mobile customization with PayLoad. This innovative platform lets you create personalized plans by choosing services like airtime, data, and more\u2014all designed to fit your lifestyle. With PayLoad, you\u2019re in control of your mobile experience.\",\"button_name\":\"Join Now\"},\"fr\":{\"heading\":\"La Solution Tout-en-Un pour Tous Vos Besoins Mobiles !\",\"sub_heading\":\"D\u00e9couvrez l\'avenir de la personnalisation mobile avec PayLoad. Cette plateforme innovante vous permet de cr\u00e9er des forfaits personnalis\u00e9s en choisissant des services tels que le cr\u00e9dit d\u2019appel, les donn\u00e9es et bien plus, le tout con\u00e7u pour s\'adapter \u00e0 votre mode de vie. Avec PayLoad, vous avez le contr\u00f4le de votre exp\u00e9rience mobile.\",\"button_name\":\"Rejoignez-nous maintenant\"},\"es\":{\"heading\":\"\u00a1La Soluci\u00f3n Todo en Uno para Todas tus Necesidades M\u00f3viles!\",\"sub_heading\":\"Descubre el futuro de la personalizaci\u00f3n m\u00f3vil con PayLoad. Esta plataforma innovadora te permite crear planes personalizados al elegir servicios como tiempo aire, datos y m\u00e1s, todo dise\u00f1ado para adaptarse a tu estilo de vida. Con PayLoad, t\u00fa tienes el control de tu experiencia m\u00f3vil.\",\"button_name\":\"\u00danete ahora\"},\"ar\":{\"heading\":\"\u0627\u0644\u062d\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0634\u0627\u0645\u0644 \u0644\u062c\u0645\u064a\u0639 \u0627\u062d\u062a\u064a\u0627\u062c\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629!\",\"sub_heading\":\"\u0627\u0643\u062a\u0634\u0641 \u0645\u0633\u062a\u0642\u0628\u0644 \u062a\u062e\u0635\u064a\u0635 \u0627\u0644\u0647\u0648\u0627\u062a\u0641 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629 \u0645\u0639 PayLoad. \u062a\u062a\u064a\u062d \u0644\u0643 \u0647\u0630\u0647 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0646\u0635\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0628\u062a\u0643\u0631\u0629 \u0625\u0646\u0634\u0627\u0621 \u062e\u0637\u0637 \u0645\u062e\u0635\u0635\u0629 \u0645\u0646 \u062e\u0644\u0627\u0644 \u0627\u062e\u062a\u064a\u0627\u0631 \u062e\u062f\u0645\u0627\u062a \u0645\u062b\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u0635\u064a\u062f\u060c \u0627\u0644\u0628\u064a\u0627\u0646\u0627\u062a\u060c \u0648\u0627\u0644\u0645\u0632\u064a\u062f\u060c \u062c\u0645\u064a\u0639\u0647\u0627 \u0645\u0635\u0645\u0645\u0629 \u0644\u062a\u0646\u0627\u0633\u0628 \u0623\u0633\u0644\u0648\u0628 \u062d\u064a\u0627\u062a\u0643. \u0645\u0639 PayLoad\u060c \u0623\u0646\u062a \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062a\u062d\u0643\u0645 \u0641\u064a \u062a\u062c\u0631\u0628\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629.\",\"button_name\":\"\u0627\u0646\u0636\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u0646\"}},\"id\":\"66d92f0781bb1\",\"image\":\"3700868f-be71-47cd-8636-75d574b5fe3a.webp\",\"button_link\":\"register\"},\"66d92f4f26e74\":{\"language\":{\"en\":{\"heading\":\"Revolutionizing Mobile Recharges and Digital Gifting!\",\"sub_heading\":\"Take charge of your mobile services with PayLoad, a groundbreaking platform that lets you design your ideal plan. From airtime top-ups to data bundles, customize every detail to match your preferences seamlessly. PayLoad brings flexibility and convenience to your fingertips.\",\"button_name\":\"Join Now\"},\"fr\":{\"heading\":\"R\u00e9volutionner les Recharges Mobiles et les Cadeaux Num\u00e9riques !\",\"sub_heading\":\"Prenez le contr\u00f4le de vos services mobiles avec PayLoad, une plateforme r\u00e9volutionnaire qui vous permet de concevoir votre forfait id\u00e9al. Des recharges de cr\u00e9dit aux forfaits de donn\u00e9es, personnalisez chaque d\u00e9tail pour correspondre parfaitement \u00e0 vos pr\u00e9f\u00e9rences. PayLoad apporte flexibilit\u00e9 et commodit\u00e9 \u00e0 port\u00e9e de main.\",\"button_name\":\"Rejoignez-nous maintenant\"},\"es\":{\"heading\":\"\u00a1Revolucionando las Recargas M\u00f3viles y los Regalos Digitales!\",\"sub_heading\":\"Toma el control de tus servicios m\u00f3viles con PayLoad, una plataforma innovadora que te permite dise\u00f1ar tu plan ideal. Desde recargas de tiempo aire hasta paquetes de datos, personaliza cada detalle para que se ajuste perfectamente a tus preferencias. PayLoad pone la flexibilidad y la comodidad al alcance de tu mano.\",\"button_name\":\"\u00danete ahora\"},\"ar\":{\"heading\":\"\u062b\u0648\u0631\u0629 \u0641\u064a \u0634\u062d\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0647\u0648\u0627\u062a\u0641 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629 \u0648\u0627\u0644\u0647\u062f\u0627\u064a\u0627 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u0642\u0645\u064a\u0629!\",\"sub_heading\":\"\u062a\u0648\u0644\u0649 \u0625\u062f\u0627\u0631\u0629 \u062e\u062f\u0645\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062d\u0645\u0648\u0644\u0629 \u0645\u0639 PayLoad\u060c \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0646\u0635\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u0627\u0626\u062f\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u064a \u062a\u062a\u064a\u062d \u0644\u0643 \u062a\u0635\u0645\u064a\u0645 \u062e\u0637\u062a\u0643 \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062b\u0627\u0644\u064a\u0629. \u0645\u0646 \u0634\u062d\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u0635\u064a\u062f \u0625\u0644\u0649 \u0628\u0627\u0642\u0627\u062a \u0627\u0644\u0628\u064a\u0627\u0646\u0627\u062a\u060c \u0642\u0645 \u0628\u062a\u062e\u0635\u064a\u0635 \u0643\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0641\u0627\u0635\u064a\u0644 \u0644\u062a\u062a\u0646\u0627\u0633\u0628 \u0645\u0639 \u062a\u0641\u0636\u064a\u0644\u0627\u062a\u0643 \u0628\u0633\u0644\u0627\u0633\u0629. \u062a\u0642\u062f\u0645 PayLoad \u0627\u0644\u0645\u0631\u0648\u0646\u0629 \u0648\u0627\u0644\u0631\u0627\u062d\u0629 \u0628\u064a\u0646 \u064a\u062f\u064a\u0643.\",\"button_name\":\"\u0627\u0646\u0636\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0627\u0646\"}},\"id\":\"66d92f4f26e74\",\"image\":\"e6a8458b-e1a7-4a3e-8351-57ecebb15b06.webp\",\"button_link\":\"register\"}}}', `site_sections`.`updated_at` = '2025-05-15 14:21:08' where `id` = 3

  "old_image" => "d53f0eee-9bcc-4511-9d74-f3a722f57457.webp"
  "en_heading_edit" => "Bullion: Simplify Your Mobile Services, Instantly!"
  "en_sub_heading_edit" => "Bullion revolutionizes how you manage your mobile services. Tailor your plans effortlessly by customizing airtime top-ups, data bundles, and more to suit your unique needs and preferences. Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all solutions and embrace seamless personalization with PayLoad."
  "en_button_name_edit" => "Join Now"
  "fr_heading_edit" => "PayLoad : Simplifiez vos Services Mobiles Instantanément !"
  "fr_sub_heading_edit" => "PayLoad révolutionne la gestion de vos services mobiles. Adaptez vos forfaits en toute simplicité en personnalisant vos recharges de crédit, vos forfaits de données et bien plus, selon vos besoins et préférences uniques. Dites adieu aux solutions standard et profitez d’une personnalisation sans effort avec PayLoad."
  "fr_button_name_edit" => "Rejoignez-nous maintenant"
  "es_heading_edit" => "PayLoad: ¡Simplifica tus Servicios Móviles al Instante!"
  "es_sub_heading_edit" => "PayLoad revoluciona la manera en que gestionas tus servicios móviles. Personaliza tus planes fácilmente ajustando recargas de tiempo aire, paquetes de datos y más, según tus necesidades y preferencias únicas. Di adiós a las soluciones genéricas y disfruta de la personalización sin esfuerzo con PayLoad."
  "es_button_name_edit" => "Únete ahora"
  "ar_heading_edit" => "PayLoad: بسّط خدماتك المحمولة فورًا!"
  "ar_sub_heading_edit" => "تُحدث PayLoad ثورة في كيفية إدارة خدماتك المحمولة. قم بتخصيص خططك بسهولة من خلال تعديل شحن الرصيد، باقات البيانات، والمزيد لتلائم احتياجاتك وتفضيلاتك الفريدة. ودّع الحلول التقليدية واستمتع بالتخصيص السلس مع PayLoad."
  "ar_button_name_edit" => "انضم الان"
  "button_link_edit" => "register"
]
